summary: My \"True to Skyrim\" (TTS) series that aim to overhaul NPCs by maintaining their original personality through modified looks and/or behavior.
descriptionHtml:
Apparently, Camilla Valerius isn\'t a popular NPC to alter, so I\'m happy to be one of the few to offer a beautified rendition of her, and I think I did a fantastic job so far, at least in my own opinion :-) I changed her clothes, hair, nose, mouth, eye color, and removed makeup (except cheeks, which were toned down in color). Enjoy! :-)

========================================
ABOUT TRUE TO SKYRIM SERIES (TTS)
========================================
\"True to Skyrim\" (TTS) series is a series of mods that aim to overhaul NPCs by maintaining their original personality through modified looks and/or behavior.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15891]TTS - Uthgerd the Unbroken[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16085]TTS - Ysolda with Follower Support[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16961]TTS - Aela the Huntress[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17820]TTS - Lydia[/url]

========================================
REQUIREMENTS
========================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]

========================================
OPTIONALS (IF YOU WANT HER TO RESEMBLE THE SCREENSHOT!)
========================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10357]ApachiiSkyHair Retexture[/url] (Wild)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url] (#3)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url] (Extract eyebrows only or overwrite with CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible)

========================================
USAGE
========================================
Extract file to your Skyrim Data folder. Make sure to enable the .ESP file before starting the game.

========================================
CREDITS
========================================
Bethesda
Skyrim NPC Editor
author: hulebjoern
